Articles.Content:
Hello all, I've recently installed the Scatterer mod through CKAN and had no issues until today.

I had been running in opengl mode through steam but I wasn't happy with the jagged lines due to no anti-aliasing when using opengl.

I decided to use the amd radeon settings to force anti-aliasing in KSP but once I did all effects from scatterer disappeared.

Disabling the forced anti-aliasing and the KSP profile in the amd radeon gaming settings did nothing.

Deleting and re-installing scatterer also did nothing, and neither did running the game in directx9 or directx11.

Running a fresh install also did not work, it seems that no matter what I do scatterer fails to apply to the game since attempting to force anti-aliasing.

Edited March 9, 2016 by TheGiggleSquad
